rule.title: BEAT BACK
rule.context: If this model hits an enemy monster with this attack, after the attack is resolved you can move the monster hit up to two spaces in a straight line in any direction. During this movement, the target monster moves through and collides with buildings, unit, and hazards in its path. The target monster stops moving if it collides with another monster.

rule.title: MULTI-FIRE
rule.context: After this model resolves a blast attack, it can immediately make a blast attack with the dice in play against another enemy model. This model can make two additional attacks in this way. This model cannot make a  blast attack against the same model more than once in the same activation.

rule.title: EXPLOSION

special_rules.context: Enemy monsters do not roll Boost Dice when making body slam power attacks against this model.

special_rules.title: TECHICAL COMMAND
special_rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' blast attacks gain the Hit & Run special rule.

rule.title: MANUFACTURE
rule.context: If this attack hits an enemy unit, immediately after the attack has been resolved replace the enemy unit hit with a Faction unit from your unit reserves. The replacing Faction unit cannot participate in an attack this activation.

rule.title: HIT & RUN
rule.context: If this model hits a target model with this attack, immediately after the attack is resolved advance this model up to 3 spaces even if this model has already advanced this turn.

special_rules.title: FLANK
special_rules.context: Enemies withing two spaces of this model have their DEF reduced by 1 against brawl attacks made by allied models, to a minimum of 1.

special_rules.title: GRAPPLER
special_rules.context: Enemy models cannot move through this model or models adjacent to it. Enemy models are not immune to hazards adjacent to this model.

rule.title: POWER GORGE
rule.context: When this attack destroys an enemy model, you gain one additional Power Die.

special_rules.title: ENERGY CYCLE

rule.title: FLING
rule.context: When this attack hits a unit, choose a building or enemy model within five spaces of the unit hit. Roll the dice in play. If the chosen model's DEF is equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled, it takes 1 damage point.

special_rules.title: ACTION: REPAIR
special_rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die while adjacent to a debris pile to perform a Repair action. If the tile is a hazard, flip it to the rubble side. if the tile is rubble and unoccupied, remove it and return a destroyed building to play on that foundation.

rule.title: BEAT BACK
rule.context: If this model hits an enemy monster with this attack, after the attack is resolved you can move the monster hit up to two spaces in a straight line in any direction. During this movement, the target monster moves through and collides with buildings, unit, and hazards in its path. The target monster stops moving if it collides with another monster.
